Home → Films and DVDs → New films and DVDs for February 2015

New films and DVDs for February 2015

Jan 30, 2015 • Brandon King

Gone girl

David Fincher-directed thriller starring Ben Affleck and Rosamund Pike. When Nick Dunne’s wife goes missing, a media frenzy puts him in the spotlight.

 

Teenage mutant ninja turtles

CGI and live-action update of the classic ’90s anthropomorphic ninjas in New York City.

 

Fury

Brad Pitt and Shia LaBeouf star as World War Two allies in the final push to conquer Nazi Germany.

 

The book of life

Animated children’s movie based on Mexican traditions and folklore.

 

Annabelle

Vintage doll in a wedding dress turns evil when a satanic cult invades a young couple’s home.

 

Mr. Turner

Shenanigans of the painter J. M. W. Turner’s later years in Victorian England, starring Timothy Spall.
